title: Social Media & Content Manager – Wellness & Coaching Brands
job_overview:
Location: Remote
Start Date: ASAP
Commitment: 5-8 hours/week

About Us
We’re two heart-led brands that support individuals and families through meaningful life transitions. Our work spans birth support, parent coaching, and women’s wellness, with a focus on healing, empowerment, and grounded guidance.
Whether through education, coaching, or creative resources, we aim to offer support that’s both practical and deeply personal. We’re now looking for someone who can help us bring our message to life through intentional, aligned content and visuals.

We’re looking for a grounded and creative Content Manager to help us bring our messages to life through thoughtful, authentic content across Instagram and other platforms.

Responsibilities
- Develop monthly content calendars for both brands
- Repurpose ideas and client questions into Instagram posts, carousels, Reels scripts, and stories
- Create engaging, on-brand captions aligned with our tone (nurturing, empowering, trauma-aware)
- Design simple, beautiful Canva graphics using our brand colours/fonts
- Collaborate on email marketing campaigns and write nurturing, high-converting emails
- Format and compile downloadable PDFs (guides, toolkits, checklists) based on provided content or notes
- Track engagement and suggest content improvements
- Support IG/Google Advertisements

You’re a great fit if:
- Have experience creating content for wellness, birth or coaching brands
- Can hold trauma-awareness and emotional nuance in your messaging
- Know how to make content feel personal, real and community-centred
- Are a Canva wizard and comfortable with light design work
- Are proactive, detail-oriented and able to think like a strategist
- Have worked with women’s empowerment or parenting spaces
- Are familiar with Instagram growth strategy, Reels, and storytelling

To Apply:
Send your CV/portfolio + 3 sample posts or PDFs you've created. Feel free to share your IG handle or any accounts you’ve managed.
